name: Pirate Cannons AHOY!
description: Ahoy mateys! Take charge of your fort defenses as hostile pirates invade to steal your treasure! Defend your treasure chests in this classic cannon-shooting take in this casual tower-defense game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 400 Series DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i5/i7 Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 1000 Series DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated
